Name: Measuring Instrument
Description: This type is for any type of device that can be said to measure something.

Properties.Name: Dimension measured
Properties.Description: The dimension (e.g. length, mass, pressure, flow rate, etc.) measured by this instrument.

Properties.Name: Subclasses
Properties.Description: Subclasses of this instrument. For example, an alcohol thermometer is a subclass of thermometer.
